snippet: American premieres of the Philip Glass opera “Kepler” and of John Cage’s 1991 orchestral trilogy, “Twenty-six, Twenty-eight and Twenty-nine,” will be featured at the Spoleto Festival USA.
abstract: Schedule is announced for the Spoleto Festival USA in Charleston, SC.
lead_paragraph: American premieres of the Philip Glass opera “Kepler” and of John Cage’s 1991 orchestral trilogy, “Twenty-six, Twenty-eight and Twenty-nine,” will be featured at the Spoleto Festival USA.

headline.main: A Packed Schedule For Spoleto Festival
headline.print_headline: A Packed Schedule For Spoleto Festival
